value.label: Also known as Team India and Men in Blue, the Indian cricket team likes to play cricket.

value.label: Represents England and Wales in international cricket and drinks too much tea.

value.label: Celebrates Christmas in the summer and is constantly in danger of being bitten by poisonous animals.

value.label: Popularly referred to as the Shaheens, Green Shirts and Men in Green. They are ranked seventh in Tests, sixth in ODIs and first in T20Is.
